meaningMnemonic: If someone <kanji>abduct</kanji>s what do they <kanji>do</kanji>? That's <vocabulary>abduction</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>kidnapping</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>taking captive</vocabulary>. This word comes up fairly frequently in Japanese newspapers, and is often used to refer to kidnappings carried out by North Korea in the seventies and eighties.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
